Description: Acquisition of the equipment and software necessary for the implementation of a 5G/6G test environment within the framework of the Lusitania-5G/6G port project Financed under the Recovery Plan, Tra... Acquisition of the necessary equipment and software for the implementation of a 5G/6G testing environment within the framework of the Lusitania-5G/6G port project Funded under the Recovery, Transformation and Resilience Plan - European Union NextGenerationEU, within the framework of the UNICO R&D 6G 2023 Program Contract for the acquisition, installation and configuration of equipment that allows the establishment of a test environment for a basic 5G network architecture; in order to validate the research previously carried out through simulation techniques and make it possible to carry out new research in each of the components of the architecture or as a whole. Due to the diverse nature of the equipment to be acquired, this document is divided into two different lots, on the one hand, the expansion of the virtualization platform and on the other, the acquisition of a scalable platform for the emulation and testing of 5G mobile networks. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: UNIVERSITAT DE BARCELONA - ADMINISTRATIVE CONTRACTING OFFICE. Summary: It Services Related to Support in the Development of New Functionalities Related to the Management of Research at the University of Barcelona. Description: The purpose of the contract is the contracting of a pool of hours of computer services aimed at the development of new functionalities related to the management of research at the University of Barcelona (UB). The University of Barcelona has with a set of applications developed internally for research management grouped under the name SIRA. Currently, SIRA is in operation at both the UB and the University of the Balearic Islands (UIB) and is planned to be upcoming implementation in other institutions. On the other hand, the University of Barcelona is carrying out a significant review of the Academic Dedication Plan (PDA), which involves substantial modifications to SIRA to expand the evaluation process of research and also include the evaluation of Teaching Innovation and Dissemination. These adaptations will lead to an increase in the workload for the internal ATIC group, in charge of supporting and maintaining the applications for both the UB and the other user institutions, a fact that could have an impact on the postponement or impossibility of executing other development projects in this area. Among the various modules that have to be developed are the following: - Integration with electronic administration platforms: direct connection with document management systems and electronic records of the University. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: RECTORATE OF THE POLYTECHNIC UNIVERSITY OF VALENCIA. Summary: Supply of Laptops for the Polytechnic University of Valencia. Description: The Universitat Politècnica de València (UPV) has a laptop loan service aimed at guaranteeing that all students can access digital teaching resources and the necessary tools under equal conditions. for the development of their academic activity. This service constitutes a key element to minimize the digital divide and ensure that no student is excluded due to lack of adequate technological means. In recent years, a significant part of the laptop fleet currently available has reached the end of its technological useful life. Specifically, many computers cannot be updated to the Windows 11 operating system as they do not meet the minimum security and hardware requirements, among which stands out the absence of TPM 2.0 modules or other functionalities necessary to guarantee secure boot, system integrity and data protection. This limitation prevents equipment from being maintained in conditions that comply with the policies. cybersecurity institutions and current standards for protection against threats. As a consequence, said equipment is no longer suitable for academic use and cannot continue to be safely integrated into the IT infrastructure of the University. Furthermore, the physical deterioration associated with its age and the increasing difficulty in obtaining spare parts increase the risk of interruptions in the loan service, affecting.... Published Date: 2025-12-24. Closing Date: 2026-01-28. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: RECTORATE OF THE UNIVERSITY OF THE BALEARIC ISLANDS. Summary: Maintenance Service of the Sira Research Information and Management System for the University of the Balearic Islands.. Description: It is proposed to contract the maintenance service of the IT solution called SIRA, the research information and management system that makes it easier for researchers and managers to carry out their activity (curriculum, scientific production, projects) in a centralized, agile and friendly way. This computer solution is necessary to maintain the research activity at the UIB, both by researchers and its management by the support staff of the offices and UIB services. The SIRA application is the basis of the UIB Research Management System. To guarantee correct operation, as well as the incorporation of updates and regulatory adaptations, it is necessary to contract the right of the use of the computer solution as well as corrective and evolutionary maintenance. Doc Title: Maintenance service of the SIRA research information and management system for the University of the Balearic Islands. Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-12-23. Closing Date: 2026-02-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: UNIVERSITY OF BARCELONA. Summary: 2025/189 Services for Preparing a Cyber Security Report and Managed Services of the Microsoft Office365 Platform. Description: Description of the service: Continuous monitoring of the IT security status of the UB in order to detect possible shortcomings and propose improvements. Includes the hiring of the following services: a) Cyber ​​security report. The monitoring report of the cyber security will be presented monthly and will be based on the data (logs) collected from different platforms that will need to be configured to deliver them to Microsoft's SIEM Sentinel already in production and apply use cases.b) SIEM Sentinel Managed Service from Microsoft. Analysis, creation of use cases and automation. c) Office365 Managed Services. Microsoft Office365 Managed Services will be based on regular follow-up meetings with the various ATIC managers in order to improve cyber security proposing improvements to the different configurations and concept tests of the applications included in the Microsoft Office 365 platform. The Microsoft Sentinel (SIEM) platform is included as a Managed Service.. Published Date: 2025-12-20. Closing Date: 2026-01-08. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: UNIVERSITY OF BARCELONA
output.Summary: 2025/189 Services for Preparing a Cyber Security Report and Managed Services of the Microsoft Office365 Platform
output.Description: Description of the service: Continuous monitoring of the IT security status of the UB in order to detect possible shortcomings and propose improvements. Includes the hiring of the following services: a) Cyber ​​security report. The monitoring report of the cyber security will be presented monthly and will be based on the data (logs) collected from different platforms that will need to be configured to deliver them to Microsoft's SIEM Sentinel already in production and apply use cases.b) SIEM Sentinel Managed Service from Microsoft. Analysis, creation of use cases and automation. c) Office365 Managed Services. Microsoft Office365 Managed Services will be based on regular follow-up meetings with the various ATIC managers in order to improve cyber security proposing improvements to the different configurations and concept tests of the applications included in the Microsoft Office 365 platform. The Microsoft Sentinel (SIEM) platform is included as a Managed Service.

input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: DIGITALIZATION DEPARTMENT. Summary: Stabilization and Update of the “Ap Madrid” Application. Description: The purpose of this tender is the acquisition of system development services to guarantee the stability and updating of the information system that supports the clinical history of primary and community care (AP Madrid). The requested service must develop, among others, the following activities: − Making modifications to the software and/or data of the AP Madrid application, as well as to the integrations and/or microservices with which it connects. - Analysis, design and proposal of solutions to new requirements. − Documentation of the developments carried out. − Support for the publication of new developments in different environments. − Carrying out unit, integration and user tests. − Realization, in a manner proactive, modifications and improvements in the current operation of the software to optimize its performance. − Study and evaluation of work assignments (ETs). The successful bidder will be responsible, throughout the entire duration of this contract, for carrying out the precise tasks to ensure correct coordination, implementation and/or integration of this file with other business intelligence projects and related technological systems, as well as reporting information and following the guidelines indicated by the DGSD. The work to be carried out will comply with the specifications included in the Technical Prescription Document that governs this contract. The Objective Is The Development And Implementation Of A Technological Solution For The Generalitat Of Catalonia That, In A Comprehensive And Integrated Way, Facilitates Optimizing The Proactive Management Of Road Infrastructures And Traffic The Road Network of Catalonia To Have a Decision-Making Support System at All Levels (Strategic, Tactical and Operational). The tasks envisaged for the contract which is developed in six phases which are detailed in Section 5 of Table Prescriptions Plec (Ppt).

input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF EMPRESA NACIONAL DE INNOVACIÓN S.M.E., S.A. (ENISA). Summary: Contracting of the Application Maintenance Service on Microsoft Power Platform from Empresa Nacional De Innovación, S.M.E., S.A.. Description: The object of this contract is: • Perform maintenance of applications developed in Microsoft ecosystem technology, in particular in: MS Power Platform, Fabric, MS Azure OpenAI, Copilot (artificial intelligence agents) and Azure DevOps. • Provide support to users to resolve level 3 incidents of applications under Microsoft maintenance, aimed at ensuring business continuity. For the purposes of this contract, a level 3 incident will be understood those incidents of high technical complexity that require the intervention of specialists with advanced knowledge of the platform and that cannot be resolved at support levels 1 and 2. They include, among others, critical problems that affect service continuity, errors in the solution architecture, or incidents that require changes to advanced configuration or specific development. • Maintain and update the reports generated by the applications that are the object of the service. • Maintain data governance to ensure unique data and secure access. Contracting of the application maintenance service on Microsoft Power Platform from Empresa Nacional de Innovación, S.M.E., S.A. It must be specified that the needs for protection and continuity of service, with respect to previous contracts, they have changed, and from the organization itself municipal aspects have been detected consideration, which must be corrected in order to improve the continuity of the service itself: to be more independent, with greater management capacity compared to the operator that provides the service itself, and provide the IT service with a older self-provision of solutions, based on the services contracted to the different telecommunications operators, which must offer the services which will be detailed in the PPT. Thus, it also comes to correct the deficiencies of the telephony in Local Police and Firefighters buildings that must improve their tolerance to error, as well as in the contingencies applied, for which it is determined as essential need contracting as a service.... input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: PRESIDENCY OF THE PROVINCIAL COUNCIL OF JAÉN. Summary: Mixed Supply and Services Contract for the Execution of the Museum Project of the Villardompardo Palace-Cultural Center of the Arab Baths. Description: The purpose of this contract is the comprehensive execution of the musealization project of the Villardompardo Palace, a publicly owned property managed by the Jaén Provincial Council, located in the city of Jaén. The execution of the contract will include the manufacturing, supply, transportation, installation without work and commissioning of the museographic, scenographic, technological and signage elements contemplated in the technical project, as well as the integration of systems audiovisual, interactive, universal accessibility and museographic lighting, in accordance with the applicable technical and regulatory standards. The contract will be developed in accordance with the technical specifications, museographic criteria, resources exhibits, technological systems, plans, work schedule, list of supplies and other documentation contained in the technical document entitled “Executive Project for Musealization of the Museum Space of the Cultural Center of Los Baños Arabs (CCBBAA) - Palacio Villardompardo”, prepared by order of the Provincial Council of Jaén, which is incorporated as a binding technical basis for the execution of the contract. Summary: Maintenance and Support of Continuous Integration Software Tools and Software Quality. Description: The purpose of this report is to justify the contracting, by the Sociedad Estado Correos y Telégrafos S.A. S.M.E, hereinafter Correos, of the licensing and associated maintenance and support services for various tools software used by the Architecture and Quality Offices of the Technology Department (DTI), as well as the contracting of certain services and advanced technical support tasks on these tools and all of this, in the terms and conditions conditions indicated below. The non-division into lots is justified in article 52.3.b) Royal Decree-Law 3/2020 “The fact that the independent performance of the various services included in the object of the contract made it difficult to correct execution of the same from a technical point of view or that the risk for the correct execution of the contract comes from the nature of its object, by implying the need to coordinate the execution of the different services, issue which could be made impossible by its division into lots and execution by a plurality of different contractors.” In this case, the justification of the aforementioned assumption is met, to the extent that any division of benefits on the object identified in the previous section would make the management, control and monitoring of global activities difficult, given their technical complexity and, therefore, the required services could be compromised from.... Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2026-01-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The non-division into lots is justified in article 52.3.b) Royal Decree-Law 3/2020 “The fact that the independent performance of the various services included in the object of the contract made it difficult to correct execution of the same from a technical point of view or that the risk for the correct execution of the contract comes from the nature of its object, by implying the need to coordinate the execution of the different services, issue which could be made impossible by its division into lots and execution by a plurality of different contractors.” In this case, the justification of the aforementioned assumption is met, to the extent that any division of benefits on the object identified in the previous section would make the management, control and monitoring of global activities difficult, given their technical complexity and, therefore, the required services could be compromised from...

Summary: Rental of very High, High and Medium Volume Multifunction Equipment and other Peripherals, Destined for Different Centers and Buildings of the University of Zaragoza, in the Three Provinces of the Community.... Description: Rental of very high, high and medium volume multifunction equipment and other peripherals, destined for different centers and buildings of the University of Zaragoza, in the three provinces of the Community... Contracting on a machine rental basis very high, high and medium volume copiers/printers and other peripherals is carried out to provide the necessary service to the university community, due to the high number of copies and prints that are made. These machines are located in the reprography workshops of different Centers at the University of Zaragoza, thus facilitating the needs of students, teachers and administration and service staff, as well as digital printing on demand of many of the titles edited by the Prensas de la Universidad de Zaragoza publishing house. The production of very high volume machines is essential to reduce the printing costs of most of the graphic products generated by the University and managed through the Publications Service. By working with imposed originals, and an adequate design of the products, we are working with a cost reduction of up to 75%. From business cards, brochures or flyers, to Theses doctoral projects, teaching projects and reports, all benefit from the use of large formats and high speeds. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: CITY COUNCIL OF TARRAGONA. Summary: Development Services of the Generic Registration Management Platform.. Description: Description of the provision: Tarragona City Council needs to contract the development of a Generic Registration Management Platform with a Pure Backend architecture. The objective is to establish a robust and decoupled Central Model (Core), capable of manage in a unified way any process of admission, registration or reservation of resources. The solution must serve as an engine for the management of registrations of the whole spectrum of municipal activities, including cultural events, courses, processes of schooling (kindergartens, summer camps), capacity management (tickets), and the reservation of physical spaces (stops or seats). The service will have to be consumed exclusively through RESTful APIs by different existing frontend applications or futures.. Published Date: 2025-12-11. Closing Date: 2025-12-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: CITY COUNCIL OF TARRAGONA
output.Summary: Development Services of the Generic Registration Management Platform.
output.Description: Description of the provision: Tarragona City Council needs to contract the development of a Generic Registration Management Platform with a Pure Backend architecture. The objective is to establish a robust and decoupled Central Model (Core), capable of manage in a unified way any process of admission, registration or reservation of resources. The solution must serve as an engine for the management of registrations of the whole spectrum of municipal activities, including cultural events, courses, processes of schooling (kindergartens, summer camps), capacity management (tickets), and the reservation of physical spaces (stops or seats). The service will have to be consumed exclusively through RESTful APIs by different existing frontend applications or futures.

Summary: Contract for the Technical Support Service, Maintenance and Management of the Microcomputer Park of Sant Feliu De Llobregat City Council. (Pacc2025000004). Description: Description of the provision: The object of the contract is the provision of the technical support service, maintenance and management of the microcomputer park of Sant Feliu de Llobregat Town Council, which will include the following functions and activities:• Support technical This includes professional services for the attention, management and resolution of incidents, requests and inquiries about all the elements that make up the microcomputer park, as well as the execution of complementary tasks. Maintenance Services are included professionals to carry out the tasks associated with the corrective, preventive and evolutionary maintenance activities of the elements that make up the microcomputer park, as well as the execution of complementary tasks.• Technological renewal project They are included professional services for the comprehensive management of the technological renewal project of all hardware and software, with the activities of planning, execution, monitoring and control, documentation, change management and communication management.. Maintenance Services are included professionals to carry out the tasks associated with the corrective, preventive and evolutionary maintenance activities of the elements that make up the microcomputer park, as well as the execution of complementary tasks.• Technological renewal project They are included professional services for the comprehensive management of the technological renewal project of all hardware and software, with the activities of planning, execution, monitoring and control, documentation, change management and communication management.
